channel.title: Template Rendering :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: It was not long before new technologies sprang up to replace the ad-hoc string concatenation approach to creating dynamic pages. These template approaches allow you to write a page using primarily HTML, but embed snippets of another language to execute and concatenate into the final page. This is very similar to the template strings we have used in C#, i.e.: string time = $"The time is {DateTime.Now}";Which concatenates the invoking of the DateTime.
